name: Lil Planet
description:
[Made for Ludum Dare 38 Compo]

You are an alien in a small planet looking out for eggs. You need to collect eggs and save yourself from multiple obstacles depending on different seasons. Watch out!

Controls -

Arrow Keys - Movement

Space Bar - Jump
